data.message: Thank you for drawing that line- more people should follow suit and stand up for what’s right. I knew I could count on you. I can’t wait for that new album, I’m angry and need your music to get rid of some of this pent up aggression

replies.message: So it's only right if it follows your beliefs! That is idiocracy at its finest! The last time I checked we have to right to our own beliefs. That doesn't make it right or wrong! Keep pushing hatred! It is people like you that are causing division in this country. God bless you, have a great day!
